column1: - Critical Bug: The calculatedAndPrintValue function attempts to access an invalid iterator when the exact date is not found in the database
- Logic Error: The algorithm for finding closest dates was inverted
- Minor Bug: Inconsistent error value checking (-1 vs -42)
- Critical Bug: The result of operations is never pushed back to the stack due to incorrect placement of code after the switch statement
- Functional Issue: The calculator only processes individual characters
- The Bitcoin Exchange calculator works for basic cases but has issues with edge cases and closest-date lookups
- The RPN calculator fails for all test cases due to the critical bug
